TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 管理 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中的所有输入系统。

span.span: Manages all the input systems in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责协调所有输入系统中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。The class is responsible for coordinating all of the input systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 筛选器是侦听任何代码或。A filter is any code that listens to or . 筛选器可以修改输入的临时区域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 监视器是侦听任何代码或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 监视器不能修改输入的临时区域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 控制输入的临时区域。The controls the input staging area. 输入的临时区域可处理输入到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件。The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events. 在处理输入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]分以下阶段：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入的事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后步骤。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后续处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event.

span.span: Gets the associated with the current thread.
The input manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Internet 区域中，此类将不可用。This class will not be available in Internet zone.

permission.span: 用于获取当前输入管理器。

span.span: for getting the current input manager.
Associated enumerations:

summary.span: 当控件通过调用进入菜单模式时发生方法。

span.span: Occurs when a control enters menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件与输入的输入管理器的菜单模式的控件响应此事件注册委托。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control entering the input manager's menu mode.

summary.span: 命中测试的结果可能已更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the result of a hit-test may have changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsInMenuMode As Boolean
public: property bool IsInMenuMode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否此处于菜单模式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this is in menu mode.

value.span: 如果此处于菜单模式; 否则为。

span.span: if this is in menu mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`如果任何菜单已打开，并且它将返回`false`如果没有菜单处于打开状态。The property returns `true` if any menus are open, and it returns `false` if no menus are open.

summary.span: 当控件通过调用退出菜单模式时发生方法。

span.span: Occurs when a control leaves menu mode by calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件注册委托与此事件来响应离开输入管理器的菜单模式的控件。Components register delegates with this event to respond to a control leaving the input manager's menu mode.

public: property System::Windows::Input::InputDevice ^ MostRecentInputDevice { System::Windows::Input::InputDevice ^ get(); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，表示与最新的输入事件关联的输入的设备。

span.span: Gets a value that represents the input device associated with the most recent input event.
The input device.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to leave.

summary.span: 由组件调用以退出菜单模式。

span.span: Called by components to leave menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件都会调用此方法将输入管理器的菜单模式。A component calls this method to leave the input manager's menu mode. `menuSite`释放对窗口消息特许访问权限。The `menuSite` releases privileged access to window messages. 调用此方法会导致打开菜单，然后递减的内部计数并设置属性设置为`false`，如果这是最后一个菜单关闭。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to decrement and sets the property to `false`, if this is the last menu to close.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 之后，将会处理程序处理完输入且相应[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]在引发事件。

span.span: Occurs after the handlers have finished processing the input and the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] events have been raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 监视器是侦听任何代码或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 监视器不能修改输入的临时区域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 处理程序附加到，以便在处理程序之前在系统中调用处理程序添加用户以相反顺序调用。The handlers attached to are invoked in reverse order so that handlers added by the users are invoked before handlers in the system. 在处理输入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]分以下阶段：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入的事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后步骤。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后续处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ProcessInput(class System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs input) cil managed
Public Function ProcessInput (input As InputEventArgs) As Boolean

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Security.SecurityCritical

span.span: The input to process.
Processes the specified input synchronously.

returns.span: 如果所有输入的事件进行处理;否则为。

span.span: if all input events were handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器是侦听任何代码或。A filter is any code that listens to or . 筛选器可以修改输入的临时区域。Filters can modify the input staging area. 监视器是侦听任何代码或。A monitor is any code that listens to or . 监视器不能修改输入的临时区域。Monitors cannot modify the input staging area. 指定的输入处理的所有筛选器和监视器，并最后将被调度到作为输入事件的相应元素。The specified input is processed by all the filters and monitors and is finally dispatched to the appropriate element as an input event. 在处理输入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]分以下阶段：Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages: 1. 预处理阶段。Pre-process stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 2. 预先通知阶段。Pre-notify stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 3. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入的事件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised. 4. 通知后步骤。Post-notify stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event. 5. 后续处理阶段。Post-process stage. 输入管理器引发事件。The input manager raises the event.

span.span: is .
for processing the specified input.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PushMenuMode(class System.Windows.PresentationSource menuSite) cil managed

span.span: The menu to enter.

summary.span: 由组件调用以进入菜单模式。

span.span: Called by components to enter menu mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件调用此方法来输入的输入管理器的菜单模式。A component calls this method to enter the input manager's menu mode. `menuSite`获取对窗口消息特许访问权限。The `menuSite` gets privileged access to window messages. 调用此方法会导致打开菜单，然后递增的内部计数并设置属性设置为`true`，如果这是要打开的第一个菜单。Calling this method causes the internal count of open menus to increment and sets the property to `true`, if this is the first menu to open.

span.span: is .
